meanings.definition: A person who is in charge of or performs a specific task or service.
meanings.sent1: The wallah at the restaurant made delicious food.
meanings.sent2: The wallah fixed my car in no time.
meanings.sent3: The wallah who delivers the mail always wears a funny hat.
meanings.sent4: She is the wallah of organization in our office.
meanings.sent5: The wallah of the party kept everyone entertained with magic tricks.

meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or excitement.
meanings.sent1: Wallah! I can't believe you won the game.
meanings.sent2: Wallah, that movie was so good!
meanings.sent3: Wallah, you scared me with that prank!
meanings.sent4: Wallah, it feels like I'm dreaming!
meanings.sent5: Wallah, this is the best day ever!
